```{r  , echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.asp=0.4, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)

library(readxl)
repvars<- read_excel("database.xlsx", sheet="repvars")
repvars$year<-as.factor(repvars$year)
repvars$site<-factor(repvars$site,levels=c("concordia", "palmar","gualeguaychu"))
repvars$phenotype<-as.factor(repvars$phenotype)
repvars$rep<-as.factor(repvars$rep)

tabla_2019<-repvars[1:400,]
tabla_psf<-repvars[401:886,c(1:5)]
tabla_ovulos<-repvars[887:1310,c(1:4,8)]
tabla_polen<-repvars[1311:1672,c(1:4,6:7)]

# Combinar las tablas
tabla_2021a<-merge(x=tabla_psf, y=tabla_ovulos, by = c("phenotype","site","year","rep"), all.x = TRUE)
tabla_2021<-merge(x=tabla_2021a, y=tabla_polen, by = c("phenotype","site","year","rep"), all.x = TRUE)

tabla_2022<-repvars[1673:2096,]

repvars2<-rbind(x=tabla_2019, y=tabla_2021)
repvars2<-rbind(x=repvars2, y=tabla_2022)


```
# flower_dry_weight
```{r  , echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.asp=0.4, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)

#En mg
repvars2$flower_dry_weight<-(repvars2$flower_dry_weight)*1000

library(dplyr)
table_flower_dry_weight <- repvars2 %>%
  dplyr::group_by(site,year) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    n = n(),
    Mean = mean(na.omit(flower_dry_weight)),
    min = min(na.omit(flower_dry_weight)),
    max = max(na.omit(flower_dry_weight)),
    sd = sd(na.omit(flower_dry_weight))
  )


library(knitr)
kable(table_flower_dry_weight, format = "markdown")


```

```{r  , echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.asp=0.4, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)


library(ggplot2)
colores<-c("coral1","burlywood2","palegreen4")
ggplot(data=table_flower_dry_weight, aes(x=year, y=Mean, fill=site))+
  stat_summary(fun = "mean", size = 1, geom = "bar") +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=Mean-sd, ymax=Mean+sd),
                width=.2, position=position_dodge(.5))+
  facet_grid(.~site)+
  theme_classic()+
  labs(y="flower_dry_weight",x=NULL)+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = rel(1.5))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = colores) +
  theme(legend.title=element_blank())+
  theme(legend.position='none')+
  theme(panel.grid.major.y = element_line(color='black'))+
  theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank())+
  theme(text = element_text(size=15, color='black'))+
  theme(axis.text = element_text(color='black'))


```

```{r  , echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.asp=0.4, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)


concordia_bd<- repvars2 %>% dplyr::filter(repvars2$site == "concordia")

library(ggplot2)
g2c<-ggplot(data=concordia_bd, aes(x=phenotype, y=flower_dry_weight, form=site, colour=phenotype))+
  stat_summary(fun = "mean", size = 1, geom = "bar", fill="lightgrey", lwd = 1.5)  + geom_jitter(width=0.3) +       labs(y="flower_dry_weight") +
  scale_color_manual(values = colorescon) +
  facet_grid(.~year)+
  theme_classic()+
  labs(y="flower_dry_weight",x=NULL)+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = rel(1.5))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = colores) +
  theme(legend.title=element_blank())+
  theme(legend.position='none')+
  theme(panel.grid.major.y = element_line(color='black'))+
  theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank())+
  theme(text = element_text(size=15, color='black'))+
  theme(axis.text = element_text(color='black'))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, color='black'))
g2c
```

# polen_germination

```{r  , echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.asp=0.4, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)

library(readxl)
polen_ger<- read_excel("database.xlsx", sheet="polen_ger")
polen_ger$site<-factor(polen_ger$site,levels=c("concordia", "palmar","gualeguaychu"))
polen_ger$phenotype<-as.factor(polen_ger$phenotype)
polen_ger$polen_ratio<-(polen_ger$germinated/(polen_ger$not_germinated+polen_ger$aborted))

library(dplyr)
table_polen_ger <- polen_ger %>%
  dplyr::group_by(site) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    n = n(),
    Mean = mean(na.omit(polen_ratio)),
    min = min(na.omit(polen_ratio)),
    max = max(na.omit(polen_ratio)),
    sd = sd(na.omit(polen_ratio))
  )


library(knitr)
kable(table_polen_ger, format = "markdown")

```

```{r  , echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.asp=0.4, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)

library(ggplot2)
colores<-c("coral1","burlywood2","palegreen4")
ggplot(data=table_polen_ger, aes(x=site, y=Mean, fill=site))+
  stat_summary(fun = "mean", size = 1, geom = "bar") +
  # geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=Mean-sd, ymax=Mean+sd),
  #               width=.2, position=position_dodge(.5))+
  theme_classic()+
  labs(y="polen_ratio",x=NULL)+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = rel(1.5))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = colores) +
  theme(legend.title=element_blank())+
  theme(legend.position='none')+
  theme(panel.grid.major.y = element_line(color='black'))+
  theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank())+
  theme(text = element_text(size=15, color='black'))+
  theme(axis.text = element_text(color='black'))


```
